dm

Class Sprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • dm.Sprite

  • public class Sprite
extends java.lang.Object
    The Sprite class represents a graphical sprite with associated image and animation data. It supports two types of data storage: byte arrays and short arrays.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Image img
      The image associated with the sprite.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor for the Sprite class.

        public static Sprite Create(Image _img,
                            byte[][] _module,
                            byte[][][] _frame,
                            byte[][][] _action)
        Creates a new Sprite instance with byte array data.
        Parameters:
        _img - The image associated with the sprite.
        _module - The module data in byte array format.
        _frame - The frame data in byte array format.
        _action - The action data in byte array format.
        Returns:
        A new Sprite instance.
